Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api

Class WasmCompiler

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api.events.EventSupplier<CompilerEvent>
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api.WasmCompiler
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventDispatcher<CompilerEvent>
public class WasmCompiler extends EventSupplier<CompilerEvent>
A compiler from WebAssembly to Java bytecode.

Configuration is driven by events. See io.github.eutro.wasm2j.api.events for details.

See Also:
  • ModuleCompilation
  • CompilerEvent
